posts.text: If there’s a game that defines epic storytelling and immersive gameplay, The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt stands tall among the greatest. Released in 2015 by CD Projekt Red, this RPG is more than a game—it's an unforgettable journey through a world brimming with danger, beauty, and tough choices.

posts.author: and.yevchenko
posts.text: The Witcher IV is a single-player, open-world RPG from CD PROJEKT RED. At the start of a new saga, players take on the role of Ciri, a professional monster slayer, and embark on a journey through a brutal dark-fantasy world. Powered by Unreal Engine 5, it aims to be the most immersive and ambitious open-world Witcher game to date.
